page.title: 13The Police In Queensbury.
page.content: There are very few Police in Queensbury. They only have two Police on the beat at a time and one Police Car out at a time as well the police car comes from Wyke the police man that i talked to said the only problem was magic mushrooms which was seasonal and the other problem was under age drinking when they catch a person if they are under age of ten they don't get into trouble if they are over the age of ten-sixteen they will be warned once and they are adults they will be sent to town to be dealt with the worst crime in Queensbury was a murder crime.
